Flickr mashups

If you've been reading this for a while you'll know what a mad keen supporter of flickr I am, well today I'm looking through flickr mashup sites - sites which make use of the publicly available API that flickr publishes. I've currently visited 2 of the top ten listed in this wired review and had to publish this, my email address in flickr letters :)
